snippet.title: Figment 2: Creed Valley - Trailer | Discarded Opinion Song
snippet.description:
Venture into The Mind to face musical nightmares and meet a cast of whimsical characters!

Wishlist Figment 2: Creed Valley:
- Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1085220
- Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/figment-2-creed-valley-switch/

FOLLOW US:
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/BedtimeDG
- Discord: https://discord.gg/bedtimedg
- Twitch: https://twitch.tv/bedtimedg
- TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@bedtimedigitalgames

The Discarded Opinion Song reflects all of The Mind's rejected ideas. Bedtime Digital Games does not share the values of the lyrics in this trailer. 

#OTKGamesExpo #Figment2 #Asmongold
